summary: Fixes system cursor bug after ALT+TAB
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply hides system cursor when you\'re in game, and enables it when you switch to other app.

Added sk_fix.exe - it\'s alternative if you want to use other launcher.  This file has no ability to launch Skyrim, but works fine if game is already running.

INSTALLATION(sk_launcher):
Set skyrim to run in windowed mode, and set the correct resolution.
Copy sk_launcher.exe into your main skyrim folder - not the data folder.
Run sk_launcher.exe.
Check \"use skse\" box to use skse_loader(if you have one).
Check \"use SBW\" box to use SBW.exe(if you have one).
Launch the game via \"Launch\" button.
Enjoy =)

INSTALLATION(sk_fix):
1.Copy sk_fix.exe into your main skyrim folder - not the data folder.
2.Launch Skyrim as you normally do.
3.Wait untill Skyrim window appears
4.Run sk_fix.exe
Enjoy =)

v1.0.0.1
Now automatically minimizes to tray after launch.

Requires .NET Framework 3.5 or higher.

I\'ve written it in C#. No viruses.
If you find any bugs, please inform me.
author: agdev
